lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four new playable races, new character options, professions, feats, rules for insanity and dreaming as well as dozens of detailed Mythos cults--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This patented method will give you the tools to uncock your dice and unlock the advantage within.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Through my seminars, workshops, and expensive one-on-one dice coaching sessions, I will change your inspiration from a d4--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want you all to repeat this mantra after me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should be rolling shittier, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got 11 and a one on my wizard hat and book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nathaniel, can you hold one fist up like this? Can you go, "It's a me?" (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love it. I love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ? Role ? ? Critical Role ? ? Critical Role ? ? Mighty Nein, Mighty Nein ? ? Roll the dice, roll the dice (dice, dice) ? ? The adventure begins ? ? They were always beside you ? ? Your nerdy best friends ? ? And the DM to guide you ? ? And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ? ? Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead ? (heroic music) ? They got magic and flair ? ? They got falchions and cunning ? ? They don't see over there ? ? There's a monster incoming ? ? Inspiration is waiting ? ? Rise up, don't think twice ? ? Put your fate in your hands ? ? Take a chance, roll the dice ? ? Roll the dice (Role) ? ? Critical Role (roll the dice) ? ? Critical Role (roll the dice) ? ? Can you answer the call? ? ? Dig in deep in your soul ? ? As the legend unfolds ? ? Now it's your turn (your turn, your turn) ? ? To roll ? (flames whooshing) (dragon roaring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Fjord, who is awake through this, also taking in the repercussions or the connotations of what has just transpired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not naked. I'm wearing pants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You better have a wizard's explanation for that and for hers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it glowing? Is it glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like a red-- it looks almost like a tattoo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to crawl out of bed and run over and take Beau's hand and start looking at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel raised? Does it feel just fully flat, like it's...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you care to share what might've been happening just before that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A big red eye and thousands of voices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you hear it now? You can't hear it now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you evil in some way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they were, would they tell you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you sense that? Don't you have ways of sensing evil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, if there's something crazy happening, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With your permission, Caleb, can I just sort of try to etch it out, if it's just on the surface?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might hurt. Actually, you know what? Maybe I should do it to Beau. It's going to hurt and he's not really great with pain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is what I do everything with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You smash that into things that nobody else should be smashing their hand into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to hold it up, have a big scar and people will won't want to fuck with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can do a tiny portion, a tiny portion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: if we have to fight something and you're not fully, you know, up to par?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to heal it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See what happens? I'm going to try to cast Greater Restoration on the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and mark off the cost.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In the meantime, I'm going to grab Beau's hand and just start just trying to rub it off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know it's not going to do anything--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just rub one out real quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rub one out real quick. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could use both hands. I only need one, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can just do it in one hand real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have dust. I have residuum and I have a lot of diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Residuum can be used to replace it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have any way to just crush these diamonds real fast, do we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do it in 10 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's having with fucked up dreams now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, take one of the 500 gold diamonds and turn it into dust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will that hinder any other future spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I've got quite a few diamonds now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skin's heating up around it, but there is no friction heat generated where the actual eye is on the hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let's-- one thing at a time. Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's wait a few minutes so Caleb can do-- Oh my god. What if you can't do spells now that you have the eye?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it cancels all the spells like Lucien's stuff does? Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lay out a bit of cloth and spend the next several minutes casting Fabricate, which can change the shape of it into a fine powder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as it crumbles and transitions into dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I have 100 gold piles and I'm going to use one to do Greater Restoration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just cut hand off, what do you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can't cut Caleb's shoulder off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will acid it. I'll acid it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that going to eat the cloth? I'm a scientist, I know how this works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cloth isn't your friend in this, necessarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I dribble the acid right just a little bit onto the-- oh, do you need something to bite down on? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop a little bit onto the eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lands in the eye and you wince.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean it's not burning? It's not burning through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just resting on the eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to kill Dracula to make that shit go away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, so if we attack Lucien, don't aim for the eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, can you just pour it back into my vial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of it just spills off and you pull away and it hits the ground and it burns for a second, but you quickly neutralize it with whatever you have available to neutral-- If you have anything to neutralize acid or it's just you screaming for the 10 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's going to burn for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should probably learn some chemistry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should probably have some base if you're going to be carrying around vials of acid and play with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have our daily Hail Marys if we want to try that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can try but we haven't taken a long rest yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we still not long rested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. This has not been a full long rest yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to have to go sleep again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wee hours of the morning or night? Because there were-- some time passed, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, clocks in every room that mark--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- the passing of time outside where we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just out of idle curiosity, I'm going to try and cast Blindness on the eye and not on Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like, I should be able to tell the difference between a spell hitting and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you are not focusing on her vision center, the spell just has no target and dissipates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nevermind. I was going to say if I'm really not concentrating, I would have that moment of "it didn't wor-- oh, sorry."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right. Fair enough. Good looking out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will try Identify on Beau's hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's because it's hard for you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need both hands to do stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, ten minutes like this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone want to do my nails while we're just doing everything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does any one have a file? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take my paints out and I'll paint your nails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I paint them red to match the eye?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you paint them with the magical paint?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Paint off the tips of her fingers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not to suggest this, but worst case scenario, we could always try and...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either of us could pull that off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you grow it back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to grow back with a red eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one's cutting off my arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, not your arm. We can start with Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's not based in her hand, you know? She had a dream, they had dreams.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The only solution is to cut their heads off at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing but bad stuff happens from dreams.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying, it would be pretty amazing experiment if we just tried it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would need to do it tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It will help dry it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to hack off Beauregard hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not consenting to any of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just have a flashback to the dream you just had and nothing more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So that's not going to work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your cuticles are a mess, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the fucking tundra. Fuck you, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this what the eyes do? Makes you see every little detail about that person?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what did you see other than, like, busted-ass cuticles?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waiting for the other shoe to drop here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think we'll be able to get sleep again, ever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably sees it all the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tomorrow won't be a problem for Caleb, but, Beau, do you think maybe you should wrap that thing up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want him to know at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He probably can see through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's confirmed because we've seen that with the others, right? That he can see through these eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can? He can see through them? Oh my god. What if he tries to take control of them and he takes control of you two as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if he sees through those eyes or if something is seeing through those eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what if you guys start speaking in unison in that creepy way that he does sometimes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What am I thinking right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to hit me in the nose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I was thinking about waffles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gisela, go up and get-- bring down two plates of waffles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got my bracers, my wraps because, you know, I got to protect the wrists so I do the wraps. Then I do the bracers, and then I do my lightning gloves on top. So I'm covered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to smell the gloves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could smell her hands when I was painting her nails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you guys-- Oh no. How are you going to sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe-- Maybe this is a good thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we'll get a little bit more inside information as we get into this and we'll have a little bit...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we get closer to our enemies and if we go too far, it is up to you all to keep us from going over the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if every time you go to sleep you get another eyeball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's technically not a full rest yet, either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we just have to wait and see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to sleep, is what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go to sleep, but I'm going to sleep with a pencil in hand on an open page of my notebook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a little earlier in the morning then because we never quite finished your first watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know I was the last.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll try to go back to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to say, according to what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you do, Travis? What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push through the boredom and then eventually finish your watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're taking the last watch, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a perception check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It just, like, draws your eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to complete a long rest and all of you come to consciousness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everyone except for Veth and Caleb have the one point of exhaustion, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did a-- cast a spell, restoration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't a total waste. That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I mean, you always need one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have one level of exhaustion? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I always forget where it's at.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine's at the top right, by hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a lot of sleep, but not a lot of dreams either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm looking at the back of Caleb's neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking at his hands and the back of his neck, all the places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it's a fucking timer? We got to move fast, I bet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any changes or additions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check your back really quickly, if that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? You don't see anything different beyond what you were shown in the middle of the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you have to look at the book again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's what friends do. Show me! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sun it for a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for-- what do you say? Get rid of the eyes or close down the--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would still, again, try to bring Molly back into the body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if I'm going to ask for something I'm going to ask for something amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That you got to be able to do it? So it's something that Artagan actually has to be able to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can be impressive, but-- So there's an entire possibility that could try and remove the eyes and it could not work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to do it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to get him to immediately bamf us to Essek.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? Is that what we want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) That's what I want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know if-- will divine teleportation be a problem?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we talked about either murdering them now--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if we go to Essek now they could skedaddle right off of this mortal coil to their destination.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'd rather that than the opposite. I don't want to lose them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That makes sense. That makes a lot of sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go for closing the site, the secret entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go for trying to make all of their relics disappear immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want the Traveler to steal them all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good to remember that we can do this, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every day we can try for something really stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then you have to take a week off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I invite them to breakfast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's time for waffles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Pull out a copper wire and will deliver to Lucien: You might be able to hear me without this, but breakfast will be in 20 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just acting like everything's fine, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to look at the book anymore, right? Caleb, you can't look at the book anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh boy, that seems like a given, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have to look at the book.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but what if it gives you more information?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we all just looked at it a little bit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know it's a bad idea, so I'm not going to continue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it's, like, a slowly spreading disease and as we rest tonight, there will be another eye, and then another?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Then you would read the book because you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just give it 24 hours, we sleep on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am here for that plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We said we would keep each other in check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's about-- Yep, I think that's about to be the thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to draw it in my sketchbook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all step into the chamber and take your places around the long table, Lucien, halfway into chewing, looks up slightly and goes, "Everyone sleep well?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a bit more travel, we'll be there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think, a day more, less?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: End of the day or tomorrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Early tomorrow, should we not run into more terrible weather."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, did you have kitty dreams? Because sometimes when I roam, I have dreams like a cat afterwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys have your breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you have anything else to discuss, you can go ahead and pick up your things and prepare for your hopefully final day's journey on to the ruins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we have eights that are bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another d8 for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so ends the story of the Mighty-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you glance over in the direction you can see there's a pack of about seven wolves, running to a northern direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're running just a northern direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, two very good rolls there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20, I can add, five plus 18 is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys follow that for a second, you're like, "Where are they rushing from?" And you glance up in the sky and you see this like glint in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we deal with rocs out here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You got to be kidding me," that what he just said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he smiling? Is he smiling, what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, running in your direction loosely the beating wings of a massive white dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the fuck out of here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a dragon into existence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away are we from the tower, really far?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We bury down in the snow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there some snowbanks or is there any outcroppings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it's a fresh snow overnight So there's snowbanks, definitely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far did we get from the house? Can we just run back into the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been traveling for four to five hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can do Marine Layer but I think they have-- they can see through anything, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True sight, yeah, so we should just bury ourselves in the snow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start wiggling, you know, like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have any Dust of whatever, or--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't have that shit in this campaign!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know I did two of those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can Pass without a Trace work on all of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking, I'm looking, hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we have to be within 30 feet of Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all have to be within 30 feet and is it anyone, a number?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Each creature you choose within 30 feet of you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all carefully get in there, I need everyone to make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hard to read this die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I going to roll? What am I rolling? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is plus 10 from you, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we tangle with a white dragon already?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this the same one? It's got to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we are in the same area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we are. In the icy--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, this could be him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh? You want to fight him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the highest roll we've ever had, 42?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With the new, plus two, three, 33 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of the natural 20 that's two in your favor. Caduceus?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, but this is not a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say, you guys have, up until Beauregard, an even number of successes and failures--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I told you I had your scent."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember? No, we fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, we pissed him off so bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, how can he smell us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think you were there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all bunched up, we should move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this heavy smashing swing sound and a bunch of snow just gets (whoosh) thrown up into the air causing this brief snow blind state.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then it all comes to rest as you can see she's sweeping her tail through the snow banks around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to move? Where are we going to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're fighting this thing, aren't we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, ooh, maybe Lucien can kill it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we've got two adventuring parties here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, move or you die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we running or are we fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a fight, it is a fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's whatever you guys want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
